title: [Bug]: Green bars and bad quality on desktop sharing
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

Since 1.14.0 the desktop and window sharing shows green bars and have a bad quality.

### What package are you using?

flatpak, appimage

### Version

1.14.0 - 2.0.8

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
Start a meeting with a dude.
Share your desktop
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
Should working fine.
```

### Additional context

We have multiple laptops with AMD iGPUs (Ryzen Gen. 4 up to Gen. 7) and Linux Mint (21 and 22)
So this problem could also be related to AMD drivers (linux stock and amdgpu) or Linux Mint itself.
We saw this error wit the flatpak and the appimage, DEB was not tested.
It does not happen within Firefox or Chrome browser.
Camera stream is not affected.
Every version since 1.14.0 up to 2.0.8 is affected.
